channel.title: Made in China on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Made in China on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Africa Is Buying a Record Number of Chinese Solar Panels
item.description: Energy-starved countries on the continent have reluctantly turned to coal and gas for decades. Cheap Chinese solar panels are now finally changing the calculus.

item.title: Africa Is Buying a Record Number of Chinese Solar Panels
item.description: Energy-starved countries on the continent have reluctantly turned to coal and gas for decades. Cheap Chinese solar panels are now finally changing the calculus.

item.title: Why Trump Flip-Flopped on Nvidia Selling H20 Chips to China
item.description: Nvidia struck a surprising deal after convincing the president that H20 chips aren’t a national security risk. But whether the reversal is good or bad depends on who you ask.

item.title: Why Trump Flip-Flopped on Nvidia Selling H20 Chips to China
item.description: Nvidia struck a surprising deal after convincing the president that H20 chips aren’t a national security risk. But whether the reversal is good or bad depends on who you ask.

item.title: Trump Is Undermining Trust in Official Economic Statistics. China Shows Where That Path Can Lead
item.description: China demonstrates how manipulating economic data can ultimately erode government credibility.

item.title: Inside the Summit Where China Pitched Its AI Agenda to the World
item.description: Behind closed doors, Chinese researchers are laying the groundwork for a new global AI agenda—without input from the US.

item.title: Americans Are Obsessed With Watching Short Video Dramas From China
item.description: How did steamy, short soap operas that originated in China become the hottest thing in Hollywood, seemingly overnight?
